017
018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.importer;
019
020import static java.util.regex.Pattern.compile;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.InputFormat.CSV;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.ISO8859_1;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.value.Pressure.MILLIMETER_OF_MERCURY;
028
029import java.io.BufferedReader;
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.io.InputStreamReader;
032import java.net.URI;
033import java.nio.charset.Charset;
034import java.time.LocalDateTime;
035import java.time.ZoneId;
036import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
037import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder;
038import java.util.Collection;
039import java.util.Objects;
040import java.util.regex.Pattern;
041import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
042
043import org.apiguardian.api.API;
044import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.DataRecord;
045import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi.DataImporterBase;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.value.PressureValue;
048
049/**
050 *  The implementation of
051 *  {@link org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.DataImporter}
052 *  for CSV files from the site &quot;blutdruckdaten.de&quot;-
053 *
054 *  @version $Id: BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter.java 120 2022-02-10 18:58:05Z tquadrat $
055 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
056 *  @UMLGraph.link
057 *  @since 0.0.1
058 */
059@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter.java 120 2022-02-10 18:58:05Z tquadrat $" )
060@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
061public final class BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter extends DataImporterBase
062{
063        /*-----------*\
064    ====** Constants **========================================================
065        \*-----------*/
066    /**
067     *  The default encoding.
068     */
069    public static final Charset DEFAULT_ENCODING = ISO8859_1;
070
071    /**
072     *  The pattern that is used to parse a data line: {@value}.
073     */
074    public static final String PATTERN =
075        """
076        "([0-9]{2}.[0-9]{2}.[0-9]{4})","([0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})","([0-9]{1,3})","([0-9]{1,3})","[0-9]{0,3}",".*",".*",".*",".*",".*",".*","([xX]?)",.*\
077        """;
078
079        /*------------------------*\
080    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
081        \*------------------------*/
082    /**
083     *  The instance of
084     *  {@link java.util.regex.Pattern}
085     *  that hold the compiled
086     *  {@linkplain #PATTERN pattern}
087     *  for parsing a data line.
088     */
089    private static final Pattern m_Pattern;
090
091    static
092    {
093        try
094        {
095            m_Pattern = compile( PATTERN );
096        }
097        catch( final PatternSyntaxException e )
098        {
099            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
100        }
101    }
102
103        /*--------------*\
104    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
105        \*--------------*/
106    /**
107     * Creates a new instance of {@code BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter}.
108     */
109    public BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter()
110    {
111        super( CSV, "blutdruckdaten.de" );
112    }   //  BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter()
113
114        /*---------*\
115    ====** Methods **==========================================================
116        \*---------*/
117    /**
118     * {@inheritDoc}
119     */
120    @SuppressWarnings( "OverlyBroadThrowsClause" )
121    @Override
122    public final Collection<DataRecord> parse( final URI source, final ZoneId timezone, final Charset encoding ) throws IOException
123    {
124        requireNonNullArgument( timezone, "timezone" );
125        final var url = requireNonNullArgument( source, "source" ).toURL();
126        final var effectiveEncoding = nonNull( encoding ) ? encoding : DEFAULT_ENCODING;
127
128        final var dateParser = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder().appendPattern( "dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm" ).toFormatter();
129        final Collection<DataRecord> retValue;
130
131        try( final var inputStream = url.openStream();
132            final var reader = new BufferedReader( new InputStreamReader( inputStream, effectiveEncoding ) ) )
133        {
134            retValue = reader.lines()
135                .map( l -> parseLine( l, dateParser, timezone ) )
136                .filter( Objects::nonNull )
137                .toList();
138        }
139
140        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
141        return retValue;
142    }   //  parse()
143
144    /**
145     *  Parses the given line.
146     *
147     *  @param  line    The line to parse.
148     *  @param  dateParser  The
149     *      {@link DateTimeFormatter}
150     *      that is used to parse the timestamp.
151     *  @param  timezone    The time zone for the timestamp on the source data.
152     *  @return The resulting data record.
153     */
154    private final DataRecord parseLine( final String line, final DateTimeFormatter dateParser, final ZoneId timezone )
155    {
156        DataRecord retValue = null;
157        final var matcher = m_Pattern.matcher( line );
158        if( matcher.matches() )
159        {
160            final var timestamp = LocalDateTime.parse( format( "%1$s %2$s", matcher.group( 1 ), matcher.group( 2 ) ), dateParser ).atZone( timezone );
161            final var systolic = new PressureValue( MILLIMETER_OF_MERCURY, matcher.group( 3 ) );
162            final var diastolic = new PressureValue( MILLIMETER_OF_MERCURY, matcher.group( 4 ) );
163            final var isIgnored = !matcher.group( 5 ).isBlank();
164            retValue = new DataRecord( timestamp, systolic, diastolic, isIgnored );
165        }
166
167        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
168        return retValue;
169    }   //  parseLine()
170}
171//  class BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter
172
173/*
174 *  End of File
175 */
